target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXCompilerInstance.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXCompilerInvocation.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXFrontendOptions.cpp)
target_sources(clangex PRIVATE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/CXTextDiagnosticPrinter.cpp)
